description: fol. 4b-11b. 236 x 152; 176 X 93 mm. 27 lin. 19th cen. On fol. 1a-2a copies of seven approbations (taqārīẓ) by Naqshabandī shaykhs. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الملك الواحد ... هذه رسالة عملتها فى تحقىق ارادة العبد الجزئىة
author: Ḥamzāwī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad, 19th cent
title: al-Risālah al-Ḥamzāwīyah fī taḥqīq al-farq bayna kasb al-Ashʻarīyah wa-al-Māturīdīyah
creator: Ḥamzāwī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad, 19th cent
subject: Free will and determinism—Religious aspects—Islam
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
